Class MossSideWhist

  • java.lang.Object
    • MossSideWhist

  • public class MossSideWhist
extends java.lang.Object
    A class implementing an object which represents an agent's view of the current game state of the trick-playing card game, Moss Side Whist.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Tim French, Evan Huang 20916873

    • Constructor Detail

      • MossSideWhist

        public MossSideWhist(MSWAgent p1,
                     MSWAgent p2,
                     MSWAgent p3)
        Constructor. Takes three agents, and initialises variables. Names will be taken fromm agents sayName method
        Parameters:
        p1 - the class of the first agent (will be leader in the first round)
        p2 - the class of the second agent
        p3 - the class of the third agent

      • MossSideWhist

        public MossSideWhist(MSWAgent p1,
                     java.lang.String n1,
                     MSWAgent p2,
                     java.lang.String n2,
                     MSWAgent p3,
                     java.lang.String n3)
        Constructor. Takes three agents and their names, and initialises variables
        Parameters:
        p1 - the class of the first agent (will be leader in the first round)
        p2 - the class of the second agent
        p3 - the class of the third agent
        n1 - the name of the first agent, must be different to n2 and n3, otherwise names reassigned
        n2 - the name of the first agent, must be different to n1 and n3, otherwise names reassigned
        n3 - the name of the first agent, must be different to n2 and n1, otherwise names reassigned

    • Method Detail

      • deal

        public void deal()
        Deals cards to players. The Hands data structure is updated with a random deal of cards with 20 to the leader and 16 to the remaining two players.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • playGame

        public void playGame(int rounds,
                     java.io.PrintStream report)
        Plays the specified number of full rotations of the game. Scoreboard is updated and results are dsplayed to the printStream. After each hand the leader role moves 1 space ot the left.
        Parameters:
        rotations, - the number of full rotations (i.e. it plays 3*rotations rounds of MossSideWhist)
        report, - a printstream to display to game state.

      • playHand

        public void playHand()
        The Logic for playing a hand of Moss Side Whist. Cards are dealt, the leader discards and then all tricks are played, until no more cards remain.

      • trick

        public java.lang.String trick(java.lang.String first)
        Logic for one trick of the game. Each agent plays a card in turn. If an agent plays an illegal card, a random legal card from their hand is played in its place. A points penalty may also be applied. Returns the name of the winner.
        Parameters:
        first - the name of the first player to play a card in this trick
